title: Require VA for data entry + AI image generation
salary: 120$ for the gig (more as project expands/work goes well)
job_overview:
For my vegan recipe page I require help with the following workflow task, totalling about 30 hours of work for now, more in the future as the project expands and if our work together goes well.

AI Image Generation: Use pre-generated Midjourney prompts (accuracy check required) to create professional AI images of cooked recipes.
Image Upload: Upload images to corresponding recipe pages.
Data Entry & Quality Assurance: Meticulously review and edit all recipe data (name, ingredients, instructions, timings, measurements) for accuracy and coherence.
Recipe Organisation: Organise entered recipes into collections and tag them correctly.

If work goes well, responsibilities may expand to include independent recipe research, cleaning up ingredients across the site, and standardising content.

The instructions are detailed on a notion page I can send to you. I don't mind what time of day the work is done but the task should ideally be completed over the next 1-2 weeks.
